item.title: AD Account Change
item.author: clburlison@gmail.com (Clayton Burlison)
item.description: Intro Changing user account logons in a deployed environment can cause some issues. Doing so with OS X clients that are bound to Active Directory can cause even more issues. Below is how I overcame some of the pitfalls of the built-in OS X Active Directory plugin. This article expands on the basic project Readme instructions located here. Note: The above picture is for reference purposes only. All data has been modified.
